snippet: Answers about a narrow building on West 46th Street and sanitation trucks headed out of the city.
abstract: FYI column answers questions about old, thin building at 19 West 46th Street in Manhattan and about New York City Department of Sanitation trucks headed for New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: Answers about a narrow building on West 46th Street and sanitation trucks headed out of the city.

headline.seo: Answers to Questions About New York
